column2: BRIEF-IAMGOLD Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.09 May 7 (Reuters) - IAMGOLD Corp: * IAMGOLD REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS: NET EARNINGS UP 335%; OPERATING CASH FLOW UP 58%; GROWTH PROJECTS FIRMLY ON TRACK * QTRLY ATTRIBUTABLE GOLD PRODUCTION OF 229,000 OZ, UP 7 PERCENT * QTRLY ATTRIBUTABLE GOLD SALES OF 235,000 OZ, UP 11% FROM Q1 2017 * MAINTAIN FULL-YEAR ATTRIBUTABLE PRODUCTION AND COST GUIDANCE FOR 2018 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.03 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
